name: Rocket Rumble (itch) (DevHiatus)
description:
Your rocket's fuel is depleting at a rapid rate, use the mouse to direct and control the rocket, weave around asteroids and beat your high score!

Each new rocket you unlock will handle differently from one another.

Helpful Tips:

  • Move from left to right to decrease the rate in which the fuel depletes
  • Avoid colliding with asteroids as you lose lots of fuel
  • Your rocket will lose fuel faster if you are stationary

This game was a fun side project - that I actually got to finish. It is pretty short as I was able unlock all the rockets in under 4 minutes after a couple attempts.

Anyway, thanks for checking the game out!

rocket go brum brum
